game_description: In the near future the Earth is ruined and undead corpses is the only thing walking the streets that were populated by living humans in the past. Survive in a post-apocalyptic Earth and destroy as many undead as you can before they take you down!!! ---Mutated Virus has the best graphics you have ever seen on Quest--- ---Official support on Quest 2 (72FPS 80 FPS 90 FPS)----- - Exploits to the fullest the hardware capabilities of the Oculus Quest. The experience from the game mechanics and graphics feels just like playing the game in Oculus Rift. A full PC-VR experience compacted into the Oculus Quest platform! - Smooth motion and framerate - Official support on Quest 2 (72FPS 80 FPS 90 FPS) - Free Movement - 14 Weapons - 3 Maps - 16 Zombies - Wordwide Leaderboards - Survival mode - Latest Gen Graphics and FX (4 GEN) - Snap turning and Smooth Turning, - Movable lights - Dual Weapons NOTE: You can play the Game offline but Internet connection required to Submit your Score!
review_1: Played for the first 1 min to 2 mins got bored quick uninstalled it can I get my money back
review_2: I got bored of the game in 2 minutes
review_3: Super fun, fast paced shooter. Mutated Virus is a fast paced fun zombie wave shooter that gets you moving right out of the gate. The weapons are cool and the different perks like time slow down that you find around the map are awesome. The heavy metal music goes perfect with the game, as well as the arena announcer who calls out all your awesome kills. Lots of fun to be had with this inexpensive horror shooter.
review_4: This is a great game to just kick back and relax and demolish zombies and just listen to music. This can get boring after about an hour but I always end up coming back to it.
